title: New: Solar Bears – Alpha People (Feat. Keep Shelly In Athens)
content:
It’s been a while since we last heard from Dublin duo Solar Bears, and what better way to announce your return than with an electro-pop classic featuring one of 2012’s most exciting artists? Alpha People plays heavily to Solar Bears eclectic influences, proving relentless and expertly utilizing the delicate vocals courtesy of Sarah from Keep Shelly In Athens.

It’s got a 60’s swing vibe to it as well, as the track skips along with a seductive groove. Check out Alpha People below.

Their sophomore full length release is expected later in the year.

Alpha People by Solar Bears
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
